verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:5
verses.text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and in all knowledge;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:6
verses.text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:7
verses.text: So that ye come behind in no gift; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:8
verses.text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 1:9
verses.text: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
